name: –The House of Evil– Pizza Time (part.2)
description:
–The House of Evil– Pizza Time (part.2)

!!!THE GAME!!!

After entering the House of Evil to deliver some pizza to an advertising agency, Delivery Dave (you) ended up in a twilight zone. The elevator took him to Level -47 (the "safety" level), the House's own scary dungeon...

Credits: Story by Karl M. – Copycheck by Sevastopol G. – Gameplay, Art and Music by Chris Bugetti– Based on GB Studio (Scripts and Tools) by Chris Maltby

–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

*** Don't forget to watch the webcomic on Instagram ***

#HouseOfEvilTheComic

–– New episodes (almost) every friday (around) 11A.M. CET ––
